profile: Welcome to Space Age Closets And Customer Cabinetry. Quality isn't expensive, it's priceless!  Space Age has been in business for over 30 years and we've evolved from simply organizing your closet to creating them from scratch.  We specialize in custom walk-in closets, custom reach-in closets, custom sliding doors, custom wall units, Murphy beds (wall beds), home offices, kitchen islands, floating shelves, and pop-up TV units.  The specialize in creating our cabinetry with Canadian materials.  We can beautify any room in your home, adding to your home's value and practicality.
service_area: We cater to an area that covers most of the GTA.  For locations further afield, we are able to ship our product.  Feel free to contact us for further information.
products: We design and construct closets from LPL (low pressure laminate), high gloss
services: Home consultation, custom design to suit your home, friendly installers.
warranty_terms: life time guarantee under normal use
name: Space Age Closets And Custom Cabinetry

profile:
Luxia as the name suggests is luxury. Luxury is timeless. The experience and the history that Luxia brings to all its clients is timeless quality.

Luxia has over 20 years knowledge of in-house manufacturing quality cabinetry. Our mission is to make clients’ visions come true utilizing our design skills, innovative up-to-date designs, current products/materials, and expert installations.

Our commitment to our clients is unsurpassed and no project is insurmountable.

Luxia Kitchens continually invests in state-of-the-art technology, maintaining its leading edge and constantly strives to achieve excellence.

Luxia values its long-term relationships with employees, suppliers, and customers.

profile:
At Garage Tailors we challenge the status quo in the home organization space, so that we can do our part to help make our clients day a little less stressful.  Our operating principles are trust, honesty, transparency and value.  The experience for our clients must be positive and one that they have to tell their friends about. 
Our philosophy is that every families garage transformation, whether it's solely a floor coating to a full renovation, be designed and constructed to be within an agreed upon budget and schedule, that is how we work with you. From the initial estimate to when we say thank you for your business, we believe that we can meet all your expectations.
We service the GTA and all the surrounding areas.
products: Solid PVC Slatwall, trim, hooks, baskets shelves from HandiWall

Painting and just about all other design and interior renovation of garages and closets
brands: HandiWall, Contur Cabinets, Sherwin Williams Polyaspartic
specialities: In addition to the services noted above, we specialize in customized, made to measure, wall and ceiling storage to maximize available storage space.
project_minimum: We don’t work on minimums or maximums, we focus on what’s right and best for you and your family

profile: Good news, homeowners: Replacing your interior doors, closet doors and closet organizers has never been easier or more affordable. One Day Doors & Closets' advanced 3D scanning technology makes it possible to replace your doors and closets for about 50% less than you'd pay using home improvement stores, handymen or contractors. Best of all, we're in and out in less than 4 hours. It's the best 'whole home improvement' you can make, for the cost, turnaround time, and the overall improvement throughout your home. No other project can update the look of your entire home as quickly and affordably without any messy, noisy or intrusive construction. We get in. We get out. You get a whole new look.

profile:
Our company specialized on design, manufacture and installation of all types of closet organizers and kitchen cabinets. 
Our goal is to make your home more comfortable and organized for any space and budget. 
Our top priority is a customer service – we want happy clients! 
And we want you to come back to us again! 
Call or email us today and we will help you to organize your home.

Our Mission
Tired of stepping over the things on the floor ? 
Don't have enough space to put on new clothes and shoes ? 
Can't see the mess in children's rooms ? We can help ! Coziness and comfort - this is what we are here for !

Our Vision
Everyone wants to be at home. But to be in a cozy, well organized home is much more attractive. 
When you have a party with your friends and relatives or sell your house - it always works to make a great impression on people. 
Remember, the coziness and comfort are the main things that everybody is looking for in life. 
You can be in two equal houses, but you will never come back to the messy one. 
Do you want to make your home the place everyone would like to return to ? 
Call us today and we can make it happen !

FOR A FREE ESTIMATE CALL
416-839-8012

profile:
The Home Organizers specialize in design and organizational services.  With more than 60 years of combined experience, we are uniquely qualified to carry out design, manufacture and installation for our clients, and we use a number of advanced tools to deliver gorgeous results. Custom Products for your: Kitchens, Closets, Vanities, Mud Rooms, Home Offices, Custom Cabinetry, Accessories, Wardrobes, Wall and Entertainment Units. 

***

Our services include:

A Thorough In-Home Consultation
On-Site Measurements and Analysis
3D-Rendered Designs for an Early Look at Your Completed Projects
Manufacturing for Cabinetry and Other Custom Pieces
Full Delivery and Installation
And More…

*****

Our goal is to leave you with a gorgeous, organized and functional home, and we’re ready to show you the advantages of working with an experienced team of designers, manufacturers and installers. Book Your FREE In-Home Consultation.

profile:
Tailored Living featuring Premier Garage of Burlington, Oakville is your local source for home organization solutions. We are part of the largest whole home organization company in North America with over 200 locations. You deal directly with the owners. No middle man!

***

Our closets are made with a composite wood board with a thermally fused melamine laminate .It is fabricated by a manufacturer that is a part of our vendor alliance assuring that the same great product is delivered every time.  

***

We partner with Sika North America, the oldest and largest manufacturer of resins in North America, to ensure we are offering the best quality garage flooring available. While our competition sells flooring on the convenience of doing a one day floor, we sell on the basis of offering the best quality floor.

***

The Tailored Living network demands the highest standard from our vendors.

profile:
Neat Organization Solutions Inc. is proud to be servicing the Ontario market place with a unique product and service offering for residential homes.

Our mission is to provide home owners with attractive and practical garage,closet and office interiors with integrated organization and storage solutions. Using only high quality products and professional installation practices, we will strive to meet the needs and expectations of our clients.

The garage and closet organization industry is new and growing rapidly. Our team will do everything possible to make the experience seamless for you. Once complete, you'll take pride in the living and storage space you've created. It's easy, because at Neat Organization Solutions Inc. we do the work and you enjoy the final product.
service_area: Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Burlington, Hamilton, St. Catharines, Niagara.
products:
Garage organization products, garage and patio flooring, garage cabinets and custom cabinets, cellular pvc slatwall, hooks, baskets, shelving, storage products. 
Custom closet organization systems in many beautiful solid and wood grain finishes. Features include sturdy non-slip rods, shelves, hampers, wood drawers, shoe rails, and many accessories such as tie or belt racks just to name a few.
Custom office organization systems, with cabinetry to fit any space. Includes desktops, coordinating file drawers, shelving etc.
services: Professional design & installation of quality garage,closet & office organization products. Custom cabinetry for garages, closets, offices, pantries, laundry room etc, as well as floor refinishing for garages, patios, and interior spaces.
brands: NeatFlooring, NeatPanels, NeatHooks, NeatBaskets, NeatShelving, NeatCabinets.
warranty_terms: 5 year Manufactures Warranty on Flooring. Manufacturers limited warranty on all cabinetry.
